data.claim: Medium-priority MCP tools for SuperAGI expansion: Slack MCP (team messaging, channel summaries), Notion MCP (official - read/write pages/databases), Discord MCP (community management), Brave/Perplexity Search MCP (citation-rich search with deep research), Postgres/Supabase MCP (direct SQL, schema management, 20+ tools).
data.snippet: Slack MCP: channel summaries, drafting, workflow automation. Notion MCP: Docs, databases, collaboration. Postgres MCP: SQL queries, schema analysis. Supabase MCP: 20+ tools including migrations, TypeScript generation.
